channel.title: Redis Enterprise Software logs on Kubernetes on Redis Documentation Center
channel.description: Recent content in Redis Enterprise Software logs on Kubernetes on Redis Documentation Center

item.title: Collect logs
item.description: The Redis Enterprise cluster (REC) log collector script (log_collector.py) creates and fills a directory with the relevant logs for your environment. These logs will help the support team with troubleshooting. As of version 6.2.18-3, the log collector tool has two modes: restricted collects only resources and logs created by the operator and Redis Enterprise deployments This is the default for versions 6.2.18-3 and later all collects everything from your environment This is the default mode for versions 6.
